code.content: search

dropdownCode.dropdownContent:
<mat-form-field class="custom-field" hideRequiredMarker="true" appearance="outline">
  <mat-label></mat-label>
  <mat-select [formControl]="prodControl" required>
    <mat-option *ngFor="let prod of products; trackBy: prod.id" [value]="prod.id">
      {{ prod.name }}
    </mat-option>
  </mat-select>
</mat-form-field>
